name: Junkbold
description:
Build a heap of unstable contraptions for your customers, but be quick and you might earn enough to buy a shiny rock!

Credits
Kyle Storch-Dolcelli - Programmer
Jordan Mullen - Artist
Soistuff - "The Trash Man"

Attributions
Town Theme - Ted Kerr

Version History

v1.1.0
-End Game camera now functions correctly
-Moved the player back to spawn after clicking on the ending sign to prevent their ghost spending their hard earned coins
-Can now buy posters at exact amounts
-Moved player spawn to what seemed fixed a bit of the buggy teleport at the start
-Fixed random respawning

v1.0.3
Added a vital missing object

v1.0.2
Fixed Steam VR popping up

v1.0.1
Added object names and tags to HUD

v1.0.0
Initial release
